Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Holland
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Ashland, 51st, Damen and 47th due to, street blockage near 47th/Holland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Midway-bound Orange Line Service Delayed at 35th/Archer
ShortDescription: Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Midway-bound Orange Line trains are standing at 35th/Archer due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
